spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Xan is a 9th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). Xan has the following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: Special Equipment
entries: Xan wields a Moonblade. The Moonblade has a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls (already factored into Xan's attacks) and has the finesse property.

trait.name: Bladesong
entries: Xan can use a bonus action to start a bladesong. His bladesong lasts for 1 minute. While using bladesong his movement increases to 40 ft., he gains a +3 bonus to his AC and he gains a +3 bonus to all {@status concentration} checks.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: Xan has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put Xan to sleep.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Xan makes two attacks with his Moonblade.

action.name: Moonblade
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d8 + 6}) slashing damage or 11 ({@damage 1d10 + 6}) slashing damage if wielded with two hands.
